name: Ocean Scenes
description:
Ready for a tropical escape but can't get away? Had to cancel your travel plans last minute because of a global pandemic?  We've got your back.

Due to the recent events with COVID-19, we felt it would be a good time to bring back our old Xbox 360 app, Ocean Scenes and port it to PC for free for everyone to enjoy! We recommend hooking it up to your TV via HDMI. :) Hopefully it helps people who may be stuck at home find a little bit of peace and relaxation during this challenging time.

---

Let Ocean Scenes transform your TV into a window looking in on a virtual vacation..in the comfort of your own living room! Choose from 18 combinations of scenery. Feel the movement of the waves and listen to the soothing sounds of the ocean. Relax in an ocean view beach house, or out on your own private stateroom balcony on a luxury cruise ship.
